snippet: Senator Claire McCaskill of Missouri sent a letter to the Federal Aviation Administration urging the agency to allow the use of electronics during the full duration of a flight. She threatened to push for legislation if the agency took too long.
abstract: Senator Claire McCaskill of Missouri sent a letter to the Federal Aviation Administration urging the agency to allow the use of electronics during the full duration of a flight. She threatened to push for legislation if the agency took too long.

headline.main: Senator Demands F.A.A. Relax Electronics Rules
